keys
fields.description: The value of the "keys" member is an array of JWK values.

fields.name: kty
fields.description: The "kty" (key type) member identifies the cryptographic algorithm    family used with the key, such as "RSA" or "EC".

fields.name: use
fields.description: The "use" (public key use) member identifies the intended use of the    public key.

fields.name: key_ops
fields.description: The "key_ops" (key operations) member identifies the operation(s)    that the key is intended to be used for.

fields.name: alg
fields.description: The "alg" (algorithm) member identifies the algorithm intended for    use with the key.

fields.name: kid
fields.description: The "kid" (key ID) member is used to match a specific key.

fields.name: x5u
fields.description: The "x5u" (X.509 URL) member is a URI [RFC3986] that refers to a    resource for an X.509 public key certificate or certificate chain.

fields.name: x5c
fields.description: The "x5c" (X.509 Certificate Chain) member contains a chain of one or    more PKIX certificates

fields.name: x5t
fields.description: The "x5t" (X.509 Certificate SHA-1 Thumbprint) member is a base64url    encoded SHA-1 thumbprint (a.k.a. digest) of the DER encoding of anX.509 certificate.

fields.name: x5t#S256
fields.description: The "x5t#S256" (X.509 Certificate SHA-256 Thumbprint) member is a    base64url encoded SHA-256 thumbprint (a.k.a. digest) of the DER    encoding of an X.509 certificate

fields.description: la class de stratégie à appeler dans la lib

fields.name: issuer
fields.description: issuer string to supply to identity provider

fields.name: decryptionPvk
fields.description: optional private key that will be used to attempt to decrypt any encrypted assertions that are received

fields.name: signatureAlgorithm
fields.description: optionally set the signature algorithm for signing requests, valid values are 'sha1' (default), 'sha256', or 'sha512'

fields.name: additionalParams
fields.description: dictionary of additional query params to add to all requests

fields.name: identifierFormat
fields.description: if truthy, name identifier format to request from identity provider (default: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.1:nameid-format:emailAddress)

fields.name: acceptedClockSkewMs
fields.description: Time in milliseconds of skew that is acceptable between client and server when checking OnBefore and NotOnOrAfter assertion condition validity timestamps. Setting to -1 will disable checking these conditions entirely. Default is 0

fields.name: attributeConsumingServiceIndex
fields.description: optional AttributeConsumingServiceIndex attribute to add to AuthnRequest to instruct the IDP which attribute set to attach to the response (link)

fields.name: disableRequestedAuthnContext
fields.description: if truthy, do not request a specific auth context

fields.name: authnContext
fields.description: if truthy, name identifier format to request auth context (default: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:ac:classes:PasswordProtectedTransport)

fields.name: forceAuthn
fields.description: if set to true, the initial SAML request from the service provider specifies that the IdP should force re-authentication of the user, even if they possess a valid session.

fields.name: skipRequestCompression
fields.description: if set to true, the SAML request from the service provider won't be compressed. authnRequestBinding: if set to HTTP-POST, will request authentication from IDP via HTTP POST binding, otherwise defaults to HTTP Redirect

fields.name: validateInResponseTo
fields.description: if truthy, then InResponseTo will be validated from incoming SAML responses

fields.name: requestIdExpirationPeriodMs
fields.description: Defines the expiration time when a Request ID generated for a SAML request will not be valid if seen in a SAML response in the InResponseTo field. Default is 8 hours.

fields.name: passReqToCallback
fields.description: if truthy, req will be passed as the first argument to the verify callback (default: false)

fields.name: logoutUrl
fields.description: base address to call with logout requests (default: entryPoint)

fields.name: additionalLogoutParams
fields.description: dictionary of additional query params to add to 'logout' requests

fields.name: logoutCallbackUrl
fields.description: The value with which to populate the Location attribute in the SingleLogoutService elements in the generated service provider metadata.

name: oidc_Client
description: description d'un client openId (c'est une application)

fields.name: client_secret
fields.description: client_secret est la clef secrète qui permet de sécuriser l’accès depuis un serveur.

fields.name: redirect_uris
fields.description: redirect_uris représente la liste des url de redirection autorisé

fields.name: response_types
fields.description: List de valeur response_type (OAuth 2.0) que le Client déclare et qu'il se restreint à utiliser.

fields.name: application_type
fields.description: Type de l'application (Si omit elle est définie comme 'web' )

fields.name: contacts
fields.description: List d'E-mails des responsable de l'application

fields.name: client_name
fields.description: Nom du Client à présenter à l' End-User

fields.name: logo_uri
fields.description: URl qui référence le Logo de l'application.

fields.name: client_uri
fields.description: URL de la page Home du Client.

fields.name: policy_uri
fields.description: Url que le Client fourni à l'utilisateur (End-User) pour définir l'étendu de l'utilisation de l'information recueilli.

fields.name: tos_uri
fields.description: URL que le Client fourni à l'End-User pour lire les termes du service.

fields.name: jwks_uri
fields.description: URL pour le document JWK (JSON Web Key Set) du Client

fields.name: jwks
fields.description: Client's JSON Web Key Set [JWK] document, passed by value.

fields.name: sector_identifier_uri
fields.description: URl utilisant le schéma https à utilisé pour le calcul d'Identifiant Pseudo-anonyme par l'OP.

fields.name: subject_type
fields.description: subject_type demandé comme réponse par le Client.

fields.name: id_token_signed_response_alg
fields.description: JWA algorithm REQUIS pour la signature de l'ID Token émit par le Client ('none' NE DOIT PAS être utilisé) .

fields.name: id_token_encrypted_response_alg
fields.description: JWA algorithm REQUIS pour l'encryption de l'ID Token émit par le Client.

fields.name: id_token_encrypted_response_enc
fields.description: JWE enc algorithme [JWA] REQUIS pour le cryptage de l'ID Token émit pars le Client.

fields.name: userinfo_signed_response_alg
fields.description: WS alg algorithme [JWA] REQUIS pour la  réponse de signature UserInfo.

fields.name: userinfo_encrypted_response_alg
fields.description: [JWE] alg algorithm [JWA] REQUIRED for encrypting UserInfo Responses.

fields.name: userinfo_encrypted_response_enc
fields.description: JWE enc algorithm [JWA] REQUIRED for encrypting UserInfo Responses.

fields.name: request_object_signing_alg
fields.description: [JWS] alg algorithm [JWA] that MUST be used for signing Request Objects sent to the OP.

fields.name: request_object_encryption_alg
fields.description: [JWE] alg algorithm [JWA] the RP is declaring that it may use for encrypting Request Objects sent to the OP.

fields.name: request_object_encryption_enc
fields.description: JWE enc algorithm [JWA] the RP is declaring that it may use for encrypting Request Objects sent to the OP.

fields.name: token_endpoint_auth_method
fields.description: Requested Client Authentication method for the Token Endpoint.

fields.name: token_endpoint_auth_signing_alg
fields.description: [JWS] alg algorithm [JWA] that MUST be used for signing the JWT [JWT] used to authenticate the Client at the Token Endpoint for the private_key_jwt and client_secret_jwt authentication methods.

fields.name: require_auth_time
fields.description: Boolean value specifying whether the auth_time Claim in the ID Token is REQUIRED.

fields.name: default_acr_values
fields.description: Default requested Authentication Context Class Reference values.

fields.name: initiate_login_uri
fields.description: URI using the https scheme that a third party can use to initiate a login by the RP

fields.name: request_uris
fields.description: Array of request_uri values that are pre-registered by the RP for use at the OP.

fields.name: post_logout_redirect_uris
fields.description: list des url de redirection pour le logout

fields.name: issuer
fields.description: issuer string to supply to identity provider

fields.name: decryptionPvk
fields.description: optional private key that will be used to attempt to decrypt any encrypted assertions that are received

fields.name: signatureAlgorithm
fields.description: optionally set the signature algorithm for signing requests, valid values are 'sha1' (default), 'sha256', or 'sha512'

fields.name: additionalParams
fields.description: dictionary of additional query params to add to all requests

fields.name: identifierFormat
fields.description: if truthy, name identifier format to request from identity provider (default: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.1:nameid-format:emailAddress)

fields.name: acceptedClockSkewMs
fields.description: Time in milliseconds of skew that is acceptable between client and server when checking OnBefore and NotOnOrAfter assertion condition validity timestamps. Setting to -1 will disable checking these conditions entirely. Default is 0

fields.name: attributeConsumingServiceIndex
fields.description: optional AttributeConsumingServiceIndex attribute to add to AuthnRequest to instruct the IDP which attribute set to attach to the response (link)

fields.name: disableRequestedAuthnContext
fields.description: if truthy, do not request a specific auth context

fields.name: authnContext
fields.description: if truthy, name identifier format to request auth context (default: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:ac:classes:PasswordProtectedTransport)

fields.name: forceAuthn
fields.description: if set to true, the initial SAML request from the service provider specifies that the IdP should force re-authentication of the user, even if they possess a valid session.

fields.name: skipRequestCompression
fields.description: if set to true, the SAML request from the service provider won't be compressed. authnRequestBinding: if set to HTTP-POST, will request authentication from IDP via HTTP POST binding, otherwise defaults to HTTP Redirect

fields.name: validateInResponseTo
fields.description: if truthy, then InResponseTo will be validated from incoming SAML responses

fields.name: requestIdExpirationPeriodMs
fields.description: Defines the expiration time when a Request ID generated for a SAML request will not be valid if seen in a SAML response in the InResponseTo field. Default is 8 hours.

fields.name: passReqToCallback
fields.description: if truthy, req will be passed as the first argument to the verify callback (default: false)

fields.name: logoutUrl
fields.description: base address to call with logout requests (default: entryPoint)

fields.name: additionalLogoutParams
fields.description: dictionary of additional query params to add to 'logout' requests

fields.name: logoutCallbackUrl
fields.description: The value with which to populate the Location attribute in the SingleLogoutService elements in the generated service provider metadata.
